name: voltaserve
description: Voltaserve is a self-hosted platform for storing, previewing, and searching documents and media with full-text search and permission controls in a modern web UI.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Store and organize documents and media files in a centralized repository

features.title: File Previews
features.description: Preview documents, images, and videos directly in the browser without downloading

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search document contents with full-text indexing for quick information retrieval

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Organize files in hierarchical folders for structured document management

features.title: Version History
features.description: Track document versions and revert to previous versions when needed

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Work together on documents with team members using shared workspaces
